    df_print: paged

```{r}
# Libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(COVID19)
```

```{r cache=TRUE, message=FALSE}
covid_us <- covid19("USA", level = 2)
```

```{r warning=FALSE}
head(covid_us)
ggplot(covid_us, aes(x = date , y = confirmed)) +
geom_line() +
facet_wrap(~id)
```


```{r}

covid_us %>% 
  dplyr::filter(id %in% unique(covid_us$id)[1:5]) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = confirmed)) + 
  geom_line() + 
  facet_wrap(~id)
```
